content: The word of the LORD that came to Joel, the son of Pethuel.
The Devastation of Locusts
Hear this, O elders,
Listen closely, all inhabitants of the land!
Has  this occurred in your days,
Or even in the days of your fathers?
Tell your children about it,
And let your children tell their children,
And their children the next generation.
Starvation and Drought
Consecrate a fast,
Proclaim a solemn assembly,
Gather the elders
And all the inhabitants of the land
To the house of the  your God,
And cry out to the  [in penitent pleadings].
Alas for the day!
For the [judgment] day of the  is at hand,
And it will come [upon the nation] as a destruction from the Almighty.
Has not the food been cut off before our eyes,
Joy and gladness from the house of our God?
The seeds [of grain] shrivel under the clods,
The storehouses are desolate  empty,
The barns are in ruins
Because the grain is dried up.
How the animals groan!
The herds of cattle are bewildered  wander aimlessly
Because they have no pasture;
Even the flocks of sheep suffer.
O , I cry out to You,
For fire has devoured the pastures of the wilderness,
And the flame has burned up all the trees of the field.
Even the wild animals pant [in longing] for You;
For the water brooks are dried up
And fire has consumed the pastures of the wilderness.
